color.description: Annotation accent color to highlight annotations in the text editor and the sidebar.

iconUrl.description: Annotatio type icon URL to display in tab headers, etc.

label.description: Annotation type label to show to user.

rdfType.description:
RDF type of the described annotation body.
(Must be an IRI string value.)

template.description:
Template to visualize annotation body.

See `AnnotationTemplateBindings` for template bindings.
